data.message: Guy, you need serious medical help. You have major anger issues. This was your way of getting some publicity because your career wasn't going anywhere. Now you surely have destroyed your career by insulting half of the country! Good Luck Em, You'll need it when you're on the unemployment line. I hope you put money away for a rainy day but most people like you don't do that and you spend more then you make. I really hope that's the case with you because maybe a little living life on the lean side will make you humble. You're evil and you don't deserve any riches for being evil.

replies.message: As if Trump isn’t in the most dire need of mental health intervention of anyone. What’s wrong with you? He’s truly crazy!
